column1: '''Tolkien metal''' is a sub-genre of ''black metal'' music
column2: influenced by the work of [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]. It is more atmospheric and ambient than original black metal
column3: and the lyrics are about Tolkien's work. The band [[Summoning]] is the most notable Tolkien metal band

column1: Although their genre is not black metal
column3: [[Battlelore]] and [[Rivendell (band)|Rivendell]] can be described as Tolkien metal because of their lyrics. However
column4: the name was specifically created for Summoning and its kind.
